text: Hi - is anyone experiencing issues with 403's on non-HubSpot sites that call use HubSpot tracking?
I'm noticing issues directly related to firefox on mac and pc
I have removed all tracking from the site and it runs correctly. (clearing cookies first)
I then visited one of my blogs that is hosted in HubSpot.
I then went back to my non HubSpot site and got more 403 forbidden errors
can you please share screenshot of something <@UJW404KBQ>, i have no issues on our clients wordpress HubSpot sites
False alarm (thankfully) It appears mod security was having issue the REQUEST.COOKIES:hsfirstvisit
